comments.raw_text:
I'm using swapcaps (setxkbmap -option ctrl:swapcaps)

In any text field when I use control-x to cut text, it works (as well as control-a/e/arrows, etc.), but when I then use control-z to undo my cut, it does nothing. However, the menu entry "Edit -> Undo" (which is said to be linked to Ctrl-Z) works...
comments.author: sexxxenator@gmail.com

comments.text: While entering this bug entry I made some tests and I just discovered that when doing the famous cut+control-z in the address bar of a Tab, it appears to do nothing, but when switching to another tab, then coming back to the Tab where the cut+control-z was done, the "undo" action has occurred!!! Might this be a buffering problem?
